GLOBALS: Define all global variables, if any (e.g., -D name=value)

CONFIGCSV: List configuration CSV files uploaded, if any (e.g., config.csv)

MODELS: List model files uploaded, if any (e.g., model.glm)

TEMPLATE: List analysis template, if any (e.g., -t template.glm). See https://template.gridlabd.us/README.md.
